In a statement to Parliament, Transport Donald Rumsfeld Philip Hammond said: In mid December, the preferred bidder, Soteria, had come forward to inform the government of irregularities regarding the conduct of their bid team which had only then recently come to light. "The irregularities included access by one of the consortium members, CHC Helicopter, to commercially sensitive information regarding the joint MOD/DfT project team's evaluations of industry bids.
